title: Unfurnished apartments, Easy freeway access, Laundry facilities
posting_body: ['Boulder II Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-No long term lease required', '-Easy freeway access', '-Laundry facilities', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Basketball hoops', '-Rent by the week or month', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
